com.lukflug.panelstudio.layout

Interface IComponentAdder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PanelAdder, SinglePanelAdder, StackedPanelAdder

    public interface IComponentAdder
    Interface representing thing that can have panels added to it.

    • Method Summary

                                                              T content,
                                                              ThemeTuple theme,
                                                              java.awt.Point position,
                                                              int width,
                                                              java.util.function.Supplier<Animation> animation)
        Add a panel.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the title component type
        T - the content component type
        Parameters:
        title - the title component
        content - the content component
        theme - the theme to be used
        position - the initial position
        width - the panel width
        animation - the animation supplier
